WPFInstall7zip.description: 7-Zip is a free and open-source file archiver utility. It supports several compression formats and provides a high compression ratio, making it a popular choice for file compression.

WPFInstallangryipscanner.description: Angry IP Scanner is an open-source and cross-platform network scanner. It is used to scan IP addresses and ports, providing information about network connectivity.

WPFInstallaudacity.description: Audacity is a free and open-source audio editing software known for its powerful recording and editing capabilities.

WPFInstallbarrier.description: Barrier is an open-source software KVM (keyboard, video, and mouseswitch). It allows users to control multiple computers with a single keyboard and mouse, even if they have different operating systems.

WPFInstallbitcomet.description: BitComet is a free and open-source BitTorrent client that supports HTTP/FTP downloads and provides download management features.

WPFInstallbitwarden.description: Bitwarden is an open-source password management solution. It allows users to store and manage their passwords in a secure and encrypted vault, accessible across multiple devices.

WPFInstallblender.description: Blender is a powerful open-source 3D creation suite, offering modeling, sculpting, animation, and rendering tools.

WPFInstallbrave.description: Brave is a privacy-focused web browser that blocks ads and trackers, offering a faster and safer browsing experience.

WPFInstallbulkcrapuninstaller.description: Bulk Crap Uninstaller is a free and open-source uninstaller utility for Windows. It helps users remove unwanted programs and clean up their system by uninstalling multiple applications at once.

WPFInstallchromium.description: Chromium is the open-source project that serves as the foundation for various web browsers such as Brave, Vivaldi and Thorium.

WPFInstallcmake.description: CMake is an open-source, cross-platform family of tools designed to build, test and package software.

WPFInstallcygwin.description: Cygwin is a large collection of GNU and Open Source tools which provide functionality similar to a Linux distribution on Windows.

WPFInstalldarktable.description: Open-source photo editing tool, offering an intuitive interface, advanced editing capabilities, and a non-destructive workflow for seamless image enhancement.

WPFInstalldeluge.description: Deluge is a free and open-source BitTorrent client. It features a user-friendly interface, support for plugins, and the ability to manage torrents remotely.

WPFInstalldigikam.description: digiKam is an advanced open-source photo management software with features for organizing, editing, and sharing photos.

WPFInstalldmt.description: Dual Monitor Tools (DMT) is a FOSS app that customize handling multiple monitors and even lock the mouse on specific monitor. Useful for full screen games and apps that does not handle well a second monitor or helps the workflow.

WPFInstallduplicati.description: Duplicati is an open-source backup solution that supports encrypted, compressed, and incremental backups. It is designed to securely store data on cloud storage services.

WPFInstallemacs.description: GNU Emacs is an extensible, customizable, free/libre text editor.

WPFInstallespanso.description: Cross-platform and open-source Text Expander written in Rust

WPFInstallfalkon.description: Falkon is a lightweight and fast web browser with a focus on user privacy and efficiency.

WPFInstallfirefox.description: Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser known for its customization options, privacy features, and extensions.

WPFInstallfirefoxbeta.description: Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser known for its customization options, privacy features, and extensions. Firefox Beta is a pre-release version of the Firefox web browser that allows users to test upcoming features before the official release.

WPFInstallfirefoxdev.description: Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser known for its customization options, privacy features, and extensions. Firefox Developer Edition is a specialized browser tailored for web developers, offering a rich set of features integrated directly into the browser to create an efficient development environment.

WPFInstallfirefoxesr.description: Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser known for its customization options, privacy features, and extensions. Firefox ESR (Extended Support Release) receives major updates every 42 weeks with minor updates such as crash fixes, security fixes and policy updates as needed, but at least every four weeks.

WPFInstallfirefoxnightly.description: Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser known for its customization options, privacy features, and extensions. Firefox Nightly is the experimental, daily-updated version of the Firefox web browser.

WPFInstallfloorp.description: Floorp is an open-source web browser project that aims to provide a simple and fast browsing experience.

WPFInstallgimp.description: GIMP is a versatile open-source raster graphics editor used for tasks such as photo retouching, image editing, and image composition.

WPFInstallgrep.description: Grep searches one or more input files for lines containing a match to a specified pattern. By default, Grep outputs the matching lines.

WPFInstallhandbrake.description: HandBrake is an open-source video transcoder, allowing you to convert video from nearly any format to a selection of widely supported codecs.

WPFInstallhelix.description: Helix is a neovim alternative built in rust.

WPFInstallheroiclauncher.description: Heroic Games Launcher is an open-source alternative game launcher for Epic Games Store.

WPFInstallhexchat.description: HexChat is a free, open-source IRC (Internet Relay Chat) client with a graphical interface for easy communication.

WPFInstallicecat.description: GNU IceCat is the GNU version of the Firefox browser. Its main advantage is an ethical one: it is entirely free software.

WPFInstallinkscape.description: Inkscape is a powerful open-source vector graphics editor, suitable for tasks such as illustrations, icons, logos, and more.

WPFInstalllibrewolf.description: LibreWolf is a privacy-focused web browser based on Firefox, with additional privacy and security enhancements.

WPFInstalllinphone.description: Linphone is an open-source voice over IP (VoIPservice that allows for audio and video calls, messaging, and more.

WPFInstalllocalsend.description: An open source cross-platform alternative to AirDrop.

WPFInstallnmap.description: Nmap (Network Mapper) is an open-source tool for network exploration and security auditing. It discovers devices on a network and provides information about their ports and services.

WPFInstallnodejs.description: NodeJS is a JavaScript runtime built on Chromium's V8 JavaScript engine for building server-side and networking applications.

WPFInstallnodejslts.description: NodeJS LTS provides Long-Term Support releases for stable and reliable server-side JavaScript development.

WPFInstallnomacs.description: Nomacs is a free, open-source image viewer that supports multiple platforms. It features basic image editing capabilities and supports a variety of image formats.

WPFInstallnotepadplus.description: Notepad++ is a free, open-source code editor and Notepad replacement with support for multiple languages.

WPFInstallobs.description: OBS Studio is a free and open-source software for video recording and live streaming. It supports real-time video/audio capturing and mixing, making it popular among content creators.

WPFInstallopenoffice.description: Apache OpenOffice is an open-source office software suite for word processing, spreadsheets, presentations, and more.

WPFInstallopenrgb.description: OpenRGB is an open-source RGB lighting control software designed to manage and control RGB lighting for various components and peripherals.

WPFInstallopenscad.description: OpenSCAD is a free and open-source script-based 3D CAD modeler. It is especially useful for creating parametric designs for 3D printing.

WPFInstallopenshell.description: Open Shell is a Windows Start Menu replacement with enhanced functionality and customization options.

WPFInstallOpenVPN.description: OpenVPN Connect is an open-source VPN client that allows you to connect securely to a VPN server. It provides a secure and encrypted connection for protecting your online privacy.

WPFInstallOVirtualBox.description: Oracle VirtualBox is a powerful and free open-source virtualization tool for x86 and AMD64/Intel64 architectures.

WPFInstallpdfsam.description: PDFsam Basic is a free and open-source tool for splitting, merging, and rotating PDF files.

WPFInstallpeazip.description: PeaZip is a free, open-source file archiver utility that supports multiple archive formats and provides encryption features.

WPFInstallplaynite.description: Playnite is an open-source video game library manager with one simple goal: To provide a unified interface for all of your games.

WPFInstallPortmaster.description: Portmaster is a free and open-source application that puts you back in charge over all your computers network connections.

WPFInstallputty.description: PuTTY is a free and open-source terminal emulator, serial console, and network file transfer application. It supports various network protocols such as SSH, Telnet, and SCP.

WPFInstallqbittorrent.description: qBittorrent is a free and open-source BitTorrent client that aims to provide a feature-rich and lightweight alternative to other torrent clients.

WPFInstallqutebrowser.description: qutebrowser is a keyboard-focused browser with a minimal GUI. Itâ€™s based on Python and Qt and free software, licensed under the GPL.

WPFInstallrevolt.description: Find your community, connect with the world. Revolt is one of the best ways to stay connected with your friends and community without sacrificing any usability.

WPFInstallripgrep.description: Fast and powerful commandline search tool

WPFInstallrustdesk.description: RustDesk is a free and open-source remote desktop application. It provides a secure way to connect to remote machines and access desktop environments.

WPFInstallsdio.description: Snappy Driver Installer Origin is a free and open-source driver updater with a vast driver database for Windows.

WPFInstallsharex.description: ShareX is a free and open-source screen capture and file sharing tool. It supports various capture methods and offers advanced features for editing and sharing screenshots.

WPFInstallsignal.description: Signal is a privacy-focused messaging app that offers end-to-end encryption for secure and private communication.

WPFInstallsimplewall.description: Simplewall is a free and open-source firewall application for Windows. It allows users to control and manage the inbound and outbound network traffic of applications.

WPFInstallstrawberry.description: Strawberry is an open-source music player that focuses on music collection management and audio quality. It supports various audio formats and features a clean user interface.

WPFInstallsupertux.description: SuperTux is an open-source classic 2D jump and run sidescroller game in a style similar to the original Super Mario games.

WPFInstallthorium.description: Browser built for speed over vanilla chromium. It is built with AVX2 optimizations and is the fastest browser on the market.

WPFInstallthunderbird.description: Mozilla Thunderbird is a free and open-source email client, news client, and chat client with advanced features.

WPFInstalltor.description: Tor Browser is designed for anonymous web browsing, utilizing the Tor network to protect user privacy and security.

WPFInstallvagrant.description: Vagrant is an open-source tool for building and managing virtualized development environments.

WPFInstallventoy.description: Ventoy is an open-source tool for creating bootable USB drives. It supports multiple ISO files on a single USB drive, making it a versatile solution for installing operating systems.

WPFInstallvlc.description: VLC Media Player is a free and open-source multimedia player that supports a wide range of audio and video formats. It is known for its versatility and cross-platform compatibility.

WPFInstallvscode.description: Visual Studio Code is a free, open-source code editor with support for multiple programming languages.

WPFInstallpalemoon.description: Pale Moon is an Open Source, Goanna-based web browser focused on efficiency and customization.

WPFInstallwinscp.description: WinSCP is a popular open-source SFTP, FTP, and SCP client for Windows. It allows secure file transfers between a local and a remote computer.

WPFInstallwireshark.description: Wireshark is a widely-used open-source network protocol analyzer. It allows users to capture and analyze network traffic in real-time, providing detailed insights into network activities.

WPFInstallxemu.description: XEMU is an open-source Xbox emulator that allows you to play Xbox games on your PC, aiming for accuracy and compatibility.

WPFInstallxournal.description: Xournal++ is an open-source handwriting notetaking software with PDF annotation capabilities.

WPFInstallxpipe.description: XPipe is an open-source tool for orchestrating containerized applications. It simplifies the deployment and management of containerized services in a distributed environment.

WPFInstallzulip.description: Zulip is an open-source team collaboration tool with chat streams for productive and organized communication.

WPFInstalltemurin.description: Eclipse Temurin is the open source Java SE build based upon OpenJDK.

WPFInstalltightvnc.description: TightVNC is a free and Open Source remote desktop software that lets you access and control a computer over the network. With its intuitive interface, you can interact with the remote screen as if you were sitting in front of it. You can open files, launch applications, and perform other actions on the remote desktop almost as if you were physically there

WPFInstallungoogled.description: Ungoogled Chromium is a version of Chromium without Google's integration for enhanced privacy and control.

WPFInstallvivaldi.description: Vivaldi is a highly customizable web browser with a focus on user personalization and productivity features.

WPFInstallwaterfox.description: Waterfox is a fast, privacy-focused web browser based on Firefox, designed to preserve user choice and privacy.
